scenes.background: You decided to help with the urgent task. [Monica] and [Bob] join the conversation.
scenes.description: 'I really appreciate your dedication, but are you sure you're okay with this?' He frowns, looking concerned.

options.text: It's fine, Bob. I can manage. Let's get this done.
options.analysis: You show a balanced approach by agreeing to help, but your emotional perception and empathy could be better.

options.text: Honestly, I'm a bit overwhelmed, but I'll push through.
options.analysis: You show high emotional perception and empathy by acknowledging your feelings, but it may affect social skills.

options.text: I'm considering it, but maybe we can find another solution.
options.analysis: You show good self-regulation and social skills by suggesting an alternative, but emotional perception could improve.
